thread.title_full: our stay - Review of The Roosevelt Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: draleaus5
title: our stay
text: we enjoyed our stay there the staff were great the only thing that we wished that we had in the room was a small fridge and a microwave and free coffee and maybe bottled water and the bathroom for me my knee trouble it was hard to get in and out of the tub shower other than that everything was great we would stay there anytime we would go to New YORK City
